channel.title: [Pi] Staff zone + Donator Zone shop]
channel.description:
Hello,
i need to make a staff zone and im looking to add a few npcs and shops how do i do this?
My donator zone shop only sells outfits and 2k each how do i edit this?
thanks. rep + +

item.title: [Pi] Staff zone + Donator Zone shop]
item.dc:creator: @batistaboy4 batistaboy4
item.description:
@batistaboy4 wrote:

shops.cfg to add/take away items, prices.cfg to make the prices different, spawnconfig.cfg to make the npc appear, actionhandler.java to make the shop tradeable

Read full topic
